Morning light: Soft golden morning light entering through windows, warm shadows, delicate haze
Evening light: Late afternoon light, orange-blue tone balance, smooth transitions between light and shadow, cinematic calm
Overcast daylight: Soft daylight from overcast sky, neutral white balance, gentle contrast, evenly diffused light
Warm artificial light: Soft warm interior light from lamps and fixtures, amber reflections, natural shadow falloff, cozy editorial lighting
Cinematic haze: Diffused cinematic lighting with subtle fog, deep atmosphere, gentle highlights and soft shadows
